content: add simple bohemian flair to your home with this free boho plant hanger crochet pattern this easy hanging planter is crocheted with worsted weight cotton yarn and fits 4-5 inch pots a free version is also available here https //www youshouldcraft com/boho-plant-hanger-crochet-pattern **materials ** 54 yards of dishie cotton or similar worsted weight cotton yarn 4 0 mm crochet hook tapestry needle scissors 12mm and 20mm wooden beads gauge ruler or 6 tassel template **share your boho plant hangers ** if you crochet a boho plant hanger please share it with me on instagram tag me @youshouldcraft or use hashtag #youshouldcraft to be featured on the you should craft feed or stories disclaimer you are welcome to sell items made using these patterns using your own images not mine but please provide credit and a link back to youshouldcraft com or my ravelry designer page permission is not granted for mass production or factory manufacturing
